data.label: Naga Reinforcement
data.description: The Naga Reinforcement Platform is a cloud-based security reinforcement solution that protects and manages files of different formats across various platforms. It integrates security techniques into application clients to address vulnerabilities without modifying client-side code, offering lifecycle security for app development, packaging, publishing, and runtime.

data.label: 娜迦加固
data.description: 娜迦信息构建的加固云平台，针对不同平台的不同格式的文件进行加固保护及策略管理。可以在不改变应用客户端代码的情况下，针对应用各种安全缺陷的保护技术集成到应用客户端内，为客户提供涵盖应用开发、打包、发布、运行全生命周期一体化安全保障服务。
